name: Oswald Forrest
description: Oswald Forrest, also known asWoodman, is the caretaker of the dolls who work atCloudsinCyberpunk 2077. Woodman is considered the talent manager of Clouds, and takes care of problems such as "problematic" dolls. He is very comfortable with his ties to theTyger Clawswhich has made him incredibly rude and arrogant. Many say Woodman has no empathy but he did once, and quickly discarded it after finding it useless. Vencounters him while infiltrating Clouds to find out the location ofEvelyn Parker. V has many ways of collecting the information from him, from bribing to threatening. Woodman reveals...
